posts.title: DOGE : End all lengthy omnibus legislative bills forever.
posts.content:
ONE OF THE FIRST THINGS D.O.G.E. MUST DO is make it unlawful for any bill to have more than one narrow subject matter; other matters require other bills to be drawn up; these must stand alone and not be reliant/depend upon passage of any other bill.

Each bill shall be no more than 12 pages in length, one-sided print, double-spaced in 12- point typeface. Bills may not "incorporate by reference" any other papers or exhibits and must stand alone. Each bill shall state its purpose, cost, and date of expiration. No bills will be proposed or passed which are without a reasonable "sunset date" incorporated. It may not be composed in “legalese” but in plain, ordinary English.

Each bill will be presented to the lawmaker in person and is to be read and voted upon by the lawmaker and not by a staff member [no staff member recommendations are to be made or countenanced]. The lawmaker will have thirty [30] days to personally read said bill and to show it publicly to his constituents for their input before voting yea or nay on it.

All votes on bills will be taken during Monday through Friday [no weekends or holidays] between the hours of 10 A.M. And 3 P.M. local time. No proxy votes. Each lawmaker is responsible.

~ 18 December 2024

Each bill shall state its purpose, cost, and date of expiration. No bills will be proposed or passed which are without a reasonable "sunset date" incorporated. It may not be composed in “legalese” but in plain, ordinary English.

Each bill will be presented to the lawmaker in person and is to be read and voted upon by the lawmaker and not by a staff member [no staff member recommendations are to be made or countenanced]. posts.content:
Just who is representing me????

When we take back the majority,,,how many times have you heard that?

When we take back the majority…what exactly do you mean? When we take back the majority!

The democrats just spanked you for the last time…

You said Speaker Mike Johnson was a republican! When exactly was he a republican? Was that before or after he betrayed the nation? Why did you lie about that?

Speaker Mike Johnson is obviously a democrat working for the Obama deep state mafia’s Nancy Pelosi and her shadow Chuck Schumer!

I have never seen a better example of treason in my life of 70 years…

This was almost a perfect setup,,,as far as proving there isn't a two party system,,,HEY RETARD,,,there is only one party, not two…

Speaker Mike Johnson (R-LA) pulled your pants down and spanked the shit out of you, with no effort at all! This was so thoroughly involved, it got by everyone...

We have seen this before with Mitch McConnell and Lindsey graham, Kevin McCarthy and Liz Chaney… All democrats pretending to be republicans to control both sides of the aisle… All of these fake republicans are involved in democrat corruption…

If this were a contest to see who betrayed their country the best, he won… Sorry McConnell, McCarthy, graham, Chaney… He kicked all your asses hands down…

This will forever be known as, is there another “Johnson” waiting in the wings?…
